description:
This is a 3-level trial/tutorial version of the game: Battlestation: Quixotic.

Are you looking for a fast paced arcade game with silky smooth touchscreen controls? 

Well then... it is time to begin your training... 

Take command of Earth's last remaining line of defense against a recon squadron of the Beta-8 Alliance. You are a gunnery cadet training on  the last remaining orbiting defense platform QXC-01, better know as the "Quixotic" Battlestation. Outfitted with an 8-way laser cannon system, the QXC-01 is capable of impressive firepower. Power-ups will beam to your area from time to time to increase the capabilities of your Battlestation. 

Features: 

Progressive difficulty levels 
Intuitive 8-Way laser cannon system to defend the Quixotic station! 
Retro-inspired intensely addictive gameplay! 
Super-responsive left/right handed touch-screen controls! (however, we suggest you use both thumbs.. seriously) 
Power-ups, bonus-points, and hull-healing warp cores! 
Excellent arcade-type sound effects and music! 
An assortment of stylish enemies with varied attack strategies! 
Retro-inspired HD graphics & cool special fx! 

If you enjoy playing Battlestation: Quixotic - Academy then fight the full battle in Battlestation: Quixotic!

Check out our website for more information. 
www.crushcrumble.com
